name: Christoffel Blond
description:
Born as âChristoffel Bierâ this was the first beer brewed by Christoffel. After the introduction of Christoffel Robertus, this beer was named Blond refering to the colour of the beer.  Blond is a low-fermenting beer with 6% alc.vol.
